name: TownePlace Suites Sacramento Cal Expo

reviews.title: Great Hotel for the Price
reviews.text: We were very pleased with this hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The location was convenient - close to a freeway but very quiet. The room was great - nicely decorated with two club chairs, two queen beds, a dining table for four that doubled as a desk and a full kitchen, including good size refrigerator, cook-top, dishwasher and microwave. The bathroom had a very nice tub/shower, very nice fixtures and a few amenities.

reviews.title: Comfortable three nights
reviews.text: We didn't use the pool or exercise facilities. We were somewhat disappointed with the continental breakfast, but it wasn't all that bad. Bagels, lots of cereals, apples, yogurt, juice and coffee.
All in all, we were very satisfied and would go there again.
reviews.title: An incredible Home away from Home

likes.liked: — I loved the spacious suite with the kitchenette facilities

reviews.text: Three new Marriott hotels are together in same collection of new office buildings along Tribute Road. They share parking lots. Although adjacent to Business I-80 east of downtown, you needed a car to get to the Arden Way mall and restaurants two miles away. That said, the suite appointments were outstanding. We enjoyed the heated pool, husband was glad to use the lobby internet. Breakfast was excellent, and one could walk to the Courtyard for lunch or dinner. (The third Marriott here is a Fairfield.)

aka: Towneplace Suites Sacramento Cal Expo Hotel Sacramento
description: Welcome to Real Living! I would like to take this opportunity to introduce you to the TownePlace Suites Cal Expo, Sacramento CA. The TownePlace Suites is conveniently located to all major destinations of Sacramento, including Sacramento International Airport, Downtown Sacramento, California State Capital, and Old Town Sacramento. We offer 117 spacious suites that come in four different floor plans, ranging from Studio Suites with one queen bed or two queen beds, One Bedroom Suites and Two Bedroom Suites. Each of our hotel suites is uniquely designed for the extended stay travel in mind with fully quipped kitchens and the welcome home feel. We provide a complimentary local shuttle service Monday-Friday,within a 5-mile radius, which would be a great transportation resource for your personnel. There is also 775 sq. ft. of meeting space that can comfortably accommodate 25-30 people as well as catering services available.
